tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Exceptional doctor with human touch 
I was suffering with fever and loose motion after a travel history and local physician in my town diagnosed me with typhoid as the widal test came positive and the medicines which he suggested were very strong ones .

I wanted to take a second opinion as I was suspicious over the diagnosis of ‚Äútyphoid ‚Äú 
Then I searched and found dr Raja . He told me that by my appearance I don‚Äôt seem to be down with typhoid (can you believe it ? He was seeing me over video call ) , and widal test usually comes positive if done in initial 3-4 days of normal viral fever also /usually not a correct report . Hence he advised me to do a blood culture report and in the interim he put me on mild antibiotics and probiotic treatment . And I started feeling much improved from second day onwards and almost recovered in span of 4 days .
Also the blood culture report ruled out any presence of pathogens there by making the chance of typhoid as null and void .

So thank you Dr Raja for saving me from becoming guinea pig . I highly thank you for your sharp acumen, knowledge , anticipation , human touch and friendly approach .
Doctors like you are tough to find .I have no second thought in recommending you for the betterment of society .my since thanks again and May gud bless you always .

Thanks
Rajeev

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I highly recommend the doctor. 

A few weeks ago, I was running a very high temperature. We had consulted two doctors before visiting Dr Raja and they had asked us to wait for 3 days for the temp to come down as it was most likely viral fever in their opinion. But after 3 days, the temperature was still running very high (103-104). When we visited Dr Raja at his clinic, he listened to us patiently and quickly conducted a few tests. Since I had no other symptoms, the doctor studied the case thoroughly and even consulted his peers to make an accurate prognosis.  He was very clear with his approach and explained to us the possible causes and treatment in detail. 

Finally, it turned out to be a rare case of typhoid which had caused severe liver inflammation. But by the time the typhoid results were in, I was already on the medication for it!

I was hospitalized in his clinic for 4 days and the staff (esp. Ms Jennifer & Ms Zainab) took very good care of me. We are very grateful to the doctor and the staff for all the help provided during that period.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My brother scheduled a video consultation for diabetes management. The Doctor seemed to be in so much hurry. When given the reports, he just scared my brother claiming that his sugar level is very high. That is so insensitive of a doctor to bluntly claim that nothing can be done for the patient. When my brother tried explaining his medical history he seemed impatient. When doubts and clarifications were asked, he just said he will get all the things in the prescriptions in the email. 

My brother is staying alone in another city and was really panicked by the comments of the doctor. Instead of being of help, he made us more anxious. 

Would never recommend him to anyone!!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My experience was everything you wish to not have with a medical practitioner. *** ****** *** *** **** ********* ***
Offer unsolicited medical advise about my Epilepsy and sleep medication. ****** *** ********* *** ****** ** ** *********** ******* ****** *** ************** ** ****** ** **** ******
Recommended I get on anti depressants since sleep issues can only be psychiatric disorders. Recommended I see a psychiatrist
Happily prescribed antibiotics along with allergy medication ***** ** ****** ****** ** ****** ** **** ** ** ******* ** ********* ********** No mention of analgesic, ** ********* ***** ** ** **** ****** ******* **** *** ****** ******* **** ***** This is everything we don‚Äôt want to deal with ever! ******* *** *** *** ********* **** **********
reply_text:
Dear Ms Rawat...Ur feedback really stands out of the normal crowd here ...We have tried to advise you to the best of ur requirements...and please we don't have to give unsolicited information in our limited time ..Anti epileptic medications can interact with multiple drugs...so we need to understand which drugs to Co prescribe for your current illness..
Anyways Wishing you a Speedy recovery.
Regards
Corona Healthcare

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Selvarajan for treating food poisoning symptoms I had. Right from the start, he was very professional and friendly. He listened to me explain the problem in detail, while simultaneously asking relevant questions about my medical history. I had also mentioned a previous diagnosis of IBS, which he not only debunked as incorrect, but also explained the implications of carrying forward the false diagnosis if one were to go abroad. Lastly, he explained what was being prescribed to me, along with why and gave some general lifestyle suggestions as well. Overall, I had a wonderful and reassuring experience with him. I definitely recommend visiting him.
